html:
Best for Beginners

Chanel Chance Eau Tendre Eau de Toilette Spray

Cons

  • Will need to re-up throughout the day

If someone would describe your aura as soft, delicate, and flirty, Chance by Chanel is your olfactory equivalent. This scent makes you want to hug yourself tight because of how dreamy you smell, courtesy of light musks and fruity tones.

Size: 1.7 fl oz

Key notes: Grapefruit, quince, jasmine, white musks

Nordstrom rating: 4.8/5 stars

A Nordstrom reviewer says: “This smells so good! I get compliments on it almost every time I wear it. It's not too sweet or flowery, but just enough and even has a bit of a fresh smell to it. It actually smells expensive if that is possible :-) Another great thing is you only need to use no more than 2 sprays. The bottle I bought should easily last me a year.”

Best Overall

Parfums de Marly Perseus Eau de Parfum

Cons

  • Citrus notes can be too much for some

The first bite of a nectar is always the juiciest, as is the initial spritz of this perfume. True to its bright packaging, Perseus lingers on the skin like tangy pulp on the lips after a bite, unfurling layers of other fruity and woody notes as it settles.

Size: 4.2 fl oz

Key notes: Grapefruit, blackcurrant, tonka bean, cashmere woods

Nordstrom rating: 4.5/5 stars

An ELLE editor says: “My favorite vacations are the ones where I'm beachside, sipping the fruitiest cocktail a bartender can make. Within a few spritzes of Perseus, I'm transported back to a sunny boat ride on the Amalfi Coast with the salty sea breeze and remnants of limoncello permeating the air. I'm the happiest person ever when I wear this, which is why it’s easily become my favorite cold-weather scent to fight winter blues.”—Nerisha Penrose, beauty commerce editor

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best for Beginners

Caudalíe Fleur de Vigne Fresh Fragrance

Cons

  • Will need to re-up throughout the day

At first glance, you might mistake this perfume for cucumber or celery water—but even without the greens, it is just as refreshing as fresh juice. Instead, it’s packed with grapefruit, rose, and pink peppercorn, making it light and energizing, as well as sweet.

Size: 1.7 fl oz

Key notes: White rose, pink peppercorn, watermelon, grapefruit, mandarin orange, cedar

Nordstrom rating: 4.7/5 stars

A Nordstrom reviewer says: “I love this fragrance. Green and fresh! Not musky or powdery. Perfect for me. Thank you!”

Best Garden Scent

Acqua di Parma 'Blu Mediterraneo' Fico di Amalfi Eau de Toilette

Cons

  • Projection could be stronger

Whenever you want to escape to Italy, take Fico di Amalfi for a spin—err, spritz. Behind the blue vial are invigorating notes that energize you instantly and evoke images of gardens, flowers, and water.

Size: 1 fl oz

Key notes: Bergamot, lemon, grapefruit, fig nectar, pink pepper, jasmine

Nordstrom rating: 4.6/5 stars

A Nordstrom reviewer says: “It's worth every penny. Takes me back to Europe, in my family's garden where we had fig trees. The smell is exactly of the fig nectar. I simply love the smell it's so blissful. People are always asking what I'm wearing.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Spicy Grapefruit Scent

Jo Malone London Grapefruit Cologne

Cons

  • Minty notes can be too strong for some

You can’t talk grapefruit perfumes without mentioning the OG. Jo Malone’s Grapefruit is earthier than most, anchored by a blend of peppers and mints.

Size: 1 fl oz

Key notes: grapefruit, tangerine, jasmine, pimento, peppermint, rosemary, vetiver, moss

Nordstrom rating: 4.4/5 stars

A Nordstrom reviewer says: “I have been a Jo Malone fan for years and the Grapefruit Cologne is one of my favorites. It is fresh, light, and full of crisp citrus notes. The candles are incredible as well.”

Best for Everyday Wear

Fresh Hesperides Grapefruit Eau de Parfum

Cons

  • Will need to re-up throughout the day

Crispy, zesty, and airy, Hesperides is almost too refreshing to be just a perfume. Think of a cold lemonade or a citrus salad—the combination of lemon and grapefruit makes this the perfect springtime to summer transitional scent.

Size: 1 fl oz

Key notes: Lemon, grapefruit, rhubarb

Ulta rating: 4.3/5 stars

An ELLE editor says: “Like a cold towel at the end of a hot yoga class, this scent is incredibly refreshing. It has the zing of grapefruit, which combined with citrus and rhubarb makes it a fresh, clean scent. I particularly like it in the shower gel format, and it's my favorite to reach for on hot, sweaty, summer days.”—Kathleen Hou, beauty director

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Musky Grapefruit Perfume

Henry Rose Windows Down Eau de Parfum

Cons

  • Projection could be stronger

Windows Down is the perfect scent to enjoy in the heart of summer, with the car top down and breeze flowing through your hair. No pungent city air here—all you smell is the sweet marriage of citrus and florals melting down into a bed of musks.

Size: 1.7 fl oz

Key notes: Neroli, grapefruit, bergamot, moss, orange flower, Earl Grey tea

Nordstrom rating: 4/5 stars

An ELLE editor says: “My first introduction to Henry Rose was through Windows Down. I romanticize my life a lot, and if I were ever in a sunny road trip rom-com, this would likely be the scent I'd wear to make my suitors swoon. It’s fruity and citrusy, but I enjoy its depth more, thanks to the moss and musks.”—Nerisha Penrose, beauty commerce editor

Best Woody Grapefruit Perfume

Penhaligon's Halfeti Eau de Parfum

Cons

  • Can lean too masculine for some

The grapefruit in this scent only pays a brief visit to allow the heavier, spicier notes their own time to shine. Halfeti isn’t for the faint of heart—it’s for those who favor bold notes and don’t mind being stopped repeatedly for compliments.

Size: 1 fl oz

Key notes: grapefruit, bergamot, cypress, cumin, nutmeg, rose, jasmine, leather, oud

Nordstrom rating: 4.5/5 stars

A Nordstrom reviewer says: “Smooth, warm, one of a kind fragrance. Unisex, perfect for when you want to turn heads.”

Best Floral Grapefruit Perfume

Tocca Cleopatra Eau de Parfum

Cons

  • Can lean mature for some

Cleopatra is an olfactory exploration of the traits she’s believed to have possessed. It’s strong, seductive, and alluring in the most sophisticated way.

Size: 1.7 fl oz

Key notes: Bitter grapefruit, white jasmine, peach nectar, tuberose-patchouli, golden amber, vanilla musk

Nordstrom rating: 4.6/5 stars

An ELLE editor says: “I'm already thinking about Mother's Day, and this is one of the gifts I plan on giving to my mother. It has rich, sophisticated notes of vanilla musk (her all-time favorite) mixed with sweet jasmine that anchor the grapefruit bitters.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content lead

Best Delicate Floral Grapefruit Scent

Creed Spring Flower

Pros

  • Great for everyday wear

Cons

  • Will need to re-up throughout the day

Citrus and nectar mingle in Creed’s Spring Flower, which swirls in a medley of soft petals, creating a scent as soft and sensual as the powder pink bottle.

Size: 1 fl oz

Key notes: Bergamot, grapefruit, lemon, apricot, jasmine, peach, white flower bouquet, cedarwood, musk

Nordstrom rating: 4.1/5 stars

A Nordstrom reviewer says: “I got a sample of this and got so many compliments I had to go and buy a bottle. It's fresh and feminine, but not sweet like so many perfumes out right now. An easy every day wear, but I miiiight just wear it on my wedding day too.”
